blocks.name: ax-rep
blocks.content: Axiom of Replacement. An axiom scheme of Zermelo-Fraenkel set theory. Axiom 5 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 19. It tells us that the image of any set under a function is also a set (see the variant ~ funimaex ). Although ` ph ` may be any wff whatsoever, this axiom is useful (i.e. its antecedent is satisfied) when we are given some function and ` ph ` encodes the predicate "the value of the function at ` w ` is ` z ` ". Thus, ` ph ` will ordinarily have free variables ` w ` and ` z ` - think of it informally as ` ph ( w , z ) ` . We prefix ` ph ` with the quantifier ` A. y ` in order to "protect" the axiom from any ` ph ` containing ` y ` , thus allowing us to eliminate any restrictions on ` ph ` . Another common variant is derived as ~ axrep5 , where you can find some further remarks. A slightly more compact version is shown as ~ axrep2 . A quite different variant is ~ zfrep6 , which if used in place of ~ ax-rep would also require that the Separation Scheme ~ axsep be stated as a separate axiom. There is a very strong generalization of Replacement that doesn't demand function-like behavior of ` ph ` . Two versions of this generalization are called the Collection Principle ~ cp and the Boundedness Axiom ~ bnd . Many developments of set theory distinguish the uses of Replacement from uses of the weaker axioms of Separation ~ axsep , Null Set ~ axnul , and Pairing ~ axpr , all of which we derive from Replacement. In order to make it easier to identify the uses of those redundant axioms, we restate them as axioms ~ ax-sep , ~ ax-nul , and ~ ax-pr below the theorems that prove them. (Contributed by NM, 23-Dec-1993.)
blocks.origin:
axiom ax-rep(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wex(s1, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom ax-rep(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0, ∃(s1, ∀(s2,(∀(s1, w0)→ s2 = s1))))→ ∃(s1, ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ s1 ↔ ∃(s0,(s0 ∈ s3 ∧ ∀(s1, w0)))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: axrep1
blocks.content: The version of the Axiom of Replacement used in the Metamath Solitaire applet ~ http://us.metamath.org/mmsolitaire/mms.html . Equivalence is shown via the path ~ ax-rep ` -> ` ~ axrep1 ` -> ` ~ axrep2 ` -> ` ~ axrepnd ` -> ` ~ zfcndrep = ~ ax-rep . (Contributed by NM, 19-Nov-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm axrep1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wex(s0, wi(wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  19.35ri(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))))
  chvarv(hs0, s1, wi(wal(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wex(s0, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))))), wi(wal(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wex(s0, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0)))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wex(s0, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0))))), wex(s0, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))))
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0)))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))))
  albidv(s2, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0))), wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))
  bibi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  elequ2(hs0, s1, s0)
  3imtr3i(wal(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wex(s0, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0))))), wal(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wex(s1, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wal(s1, w0)))))))
  ax-rep(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  albii(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))
  exbii(s1, wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))), wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
  albii(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))
  imbi1i(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w0)
  cbvexv1(s1, s0, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wal(s1, w0))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0)))))
  nfal(s0, s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wal(s1, w0)))))
  nfbi(s0, wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wal(s1, w0))))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))
  nfe1(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wal(s1, w0)))
  nfv(s1, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0)))))
  albidv(s2, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wal(s1, w0)))), wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0))))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wal(s1, w0))), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0)))
  elequ2(s1, s0, s2)
  a1i(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wal(s1, w0))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0))))
  exbii(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wal(s1, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wal(s1, w0), w0)
  19.3v(s1, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wal(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wex(s0, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s2), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wal.s(s1, s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0))))
  diff.wb.s(s1, wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s2), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wex.s(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

blocks.name: axreplem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ axrep2 and ~ axrep3 . (Contributed by BJ, 6-Aug-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm axreplem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wex(s2, wi(w0, wal(s3, wb(w1, wex(s4, wa(wcel(cv(s5), cv(s0)), w2)))))), wex(s2, wi(w0, wal(s3, wb(w1, wex(s4, wa(wcel(cv(s5), cv(s1)), w2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
} = {
  exbidv(s2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wal(s3, wb(w1, wex(s4, wa(wcel(cv(s5), cv(s0)), w2))))), wi(w0, wal(s3, wb(w1, wex(s4, wa(wcel(cv(s5), cv(s1)), w2))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, wal(s3, wb(w1, wex(s4, wa(wcel(cv(s5), cv(s0)), w2)))), wal(s3, wb(w1, wex(s4, wa(wcel(cv(s5), cv(s1)), w2)))))
  albidv(s3, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, wex(s4, wa(wcel(cv(s5), cv(s0)), w2))), wb(w1, wex(s4, wa(wcel(cv(s5), cv(s1)), w2))))
  bibi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w1, wex(s4, wa(wcel(cv(s5), cv(s0)), w2)), wex(s4, wa(wcel(cv(s5), cv(s1)), w2)))
  exbidv(s4, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s5), cv(s0)), w2), wa(wcel(cv(s5), cv(s1)), w2))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s5), cv(s0)), w2, wcel(cv(s5), cv(s1)))
  elequ2(s0, s1, s5)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s4, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s4, s0)
  diffss.ex(s4, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s4, s1)
  diffss.ex(s4, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm axreplem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (s0 = s1 →(∃(s2,(w0 → ∀(s3,(w1 ↔ ∃(s4,(s5 ∈ s0 ∧ w2))))))↔ ∃(s2,(w0 → ∀(s3,(w1 ↔ ∃(s4,(s5 ∈ s1 ∧ w2))))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
} = {
  exbidv(s2, s0 = s1, (w0 → ∀(s3,(w1 ↔ ∃(s4,(s5 ∈ s0 ∧ w2))))), (w0 → ∀(s3,(w1 ↔ ∃(s4,(s5 ∈ s1 ∧ w2))))))
  imbi2d(s0 = s1, w0, ∀(s3,(w1 ↔ ∃(s4,(s5 ∈ s0 ∧ w2)))), ∀(s3,(w1 ↔ ∃(s4,(s5 ∈ s1 ∧ w2)))))
  albidv(s3, s0 = s1, (w1 ↔ ∃(s4,(s5 ∈ s0 ∧ w2))), (w1 ↔ ∃(s4,(s5 ∈ s1 ∧ w2))))
  bibi2d(s0 = s1, w1, ∃(s4,(s5 ∈ s0 ∧ w2)), ∃(s4,(s5 ∈ s1 ∧ w2)))
  exbidv(s4, s0 = s1, (s5 ∈ s0 ∧ w2), (s5 ∈ s1 ∧ w2))
  anbi1d(s0 = s1, s5 ∈ s0, w2, s5 ∈ s1)
  elequ2(s0, s1, s5)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s4, s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s4, s0)
  diffss.ex(s4, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s4, s1)
  diffss.ex(s4, s1)
}

blocks.name: axrep2
blocks.content: Axiom of Replacement expressed with the fewest number of different variables and without any restrictions on ` ph ` . (Contributed by NM, 15-Aug-2003.)
blocks.origin:
thm axrep2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wex(s0, wi(wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, w0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  eximii(s0, wi(wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, w0)))))), wi(wex(hs0, wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, w0)))))))
  chvar(hs0, s1, wex(s0, wi(wex(hs0, wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, w0))))))), wex(s0, wi(wex(hs0, wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wal(s1, w0))))))))
  nfex(hs0, s0, wi(wex(hs0, wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, w0)))))))
  nfim(hs0, wex(hs0, wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, w0))))))
  nfe1(hs0, wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0)))))
  nfv(hs0, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, w0))))))
  axreplem(hs0, s1, s0, s2, s0, s0, wex(hs0, wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s1, w0))
  axrep1(s0, hs0, s2, wal(s1, w0))
  imim1i(wex(hs0, wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, w0))))), wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))
  sylib(wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wex(hs0, wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0))))), wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))
  eximi(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))), wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
  alimi(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))
  imim1i(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wal(s1, w0))
  sp(s1, w0)
  cbvexv1(s1, hs0, wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))), wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0)))))
  nfv(hs0, wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
  nfal(s1, s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0))))
  nfim(s1, wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0)))
  nfa1(s1, w0)
  nfv(s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0)))
  albidv(s2, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs0)))
  equequ2(s1, hs0, s2)
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, w0))))))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s1, w0))
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s2, wi(wal(s1, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s2), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s1), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: axrep3
blocks.content: Axiom of Replacement slightly strengthened from ~ axrep2 ; ` w ` may occur free in ` ph ` . (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-1997.)
blocks.origin:
thm axrep3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0) {
  |- wex(s0, wi(wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
} = {
  chvar(s1, s3, wex(s0, wi(wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0))))))), wex(s0, wi(wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, w0))))))))
  nfex(s1, s0, wi(wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0)))))))
  nfim(s1, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0))))))
  nfe1(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
  nfal(s1, s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0)))))
  nfbi(s1, wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0))))
  nfv(s1, wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
  nfex(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0)))
  nfan(s1, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0))
  nfv(s1, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)))
  nfa1(s1, w0)
  axreplem(s1, s3, s0, s2, s0, s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s1, w0))
  axrep2(s0, s1, s2, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s2), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(s3))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
}

blocks.name: axrep4
blocks.content: A more traditional version of the Axiom of Replacement. (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm axrep4(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wex(s1, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), w0))))))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
} = {
  sylib(wal(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wex(s1, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), w0))))), wex(s0, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0)))))))
  19.35i(s0, wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0))))))
  axrep3(s0, s1, s2, s3, w0)
  cbvexv1(s0, s1, wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), w0)))))
  nfal(s1, s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0)))))
  nfbi(s1, wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0))))
  nfv(s1, wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
  nfex(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0)))
  nfan(s1, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0))
  nfv(s1, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)))
  nfa1(s1, w0)
  nfal(s0, s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), w0))))
  nfbi(s0, wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), w0)))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))
  nfe1(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), w0))
  albidv(s2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0)))), wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), w0))))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0))), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), w0)))
  elequ2(s0, s1, s2)
  a1i(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), w0))))
  exbii(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), w0))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wal(s1, w0), w0)
  19.3(s1, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s2), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(s3))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s2), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: axrep5
blocks.content: Axiom of Replacement (similar to Axiom Rep of [BellMachover] p. 463). The antecedent tells us ` ph ` is analogous to a "function" from ` x ` to ` y ` (although it is not really a function since it is a wff and not a class). In the consequent we postulate the existence of a set ` z ` that corresponds to the "image" of ` ph ` restricted to some other set ` w ` . The hypothesis says ` z ` must not be free in ` ph ` . (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm axrep5(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wex(s2, wal(s3, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2))))))), wex(s2, wal(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))))
  -| wnf(s2, w0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
} = {
  sylib(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wex(s2, wal(s3, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2))))))), wex(s2, wal(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))), wex(s2, wal(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))))))
  sylbi(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wex(s2, wal(s3, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2))))))), wex(s2, wal(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))))), wal(s0, wex(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2)))))))
  albii(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wex(s2, wal(s3, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2)))))), wex(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2))))))
  bitr3i(wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wex(s2, wal(s3, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2)))))), wex(s2, wal(s3, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2))))), wex(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s3, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2)))))))
  19.37v(s2, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s3, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2)))))
  exbii(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s3, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2))))), wal(s3, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2)))))
  bitr2i(wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s3, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2))))), wal(s3, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2)))), wal(s3, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2))))))
  albii(s3, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2)))))
  impexp(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2)))
  19.21v(s3, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2))))
  axrep4(s0, s2, s3, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))
  nfan(s2, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)
  nfv(s2, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  exbii(s2, wal(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))), wal(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))))
  albii(s3, wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))), wb(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))
  bibi2i(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))
  exbii(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))
  anabs5(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
}

blocks.name: zfrepclf
blocks.content: An inference based on the Axiom of Replacement. Typically, ` ph ` defines a function from ` x ` to ` y ` . (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm zfrepclf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w0)))))
  -| wnfc(s2, c0)
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  vtocle(hs0, c0, wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w0))))))
  mpbid(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w0))))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0))))))
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0))))), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))))
  alrimi(s2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  syl6bi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s2), c0))
  axrep5(s2, hs0, s0, s1, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0)))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w0)))))
  albidv(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0))), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w0))))
  bibi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w0)))
  exbid(s2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w0))
  nfeq2(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s2), c0))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w0))))))
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm zfrepclf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ∃(s0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ↔ ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)))))
  ⊣ F/(s2, c0)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ (s2 ∈ c0 → ∃(s0, ∀(s1,(w0 → s1 = s0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  vtocle(hs0, c0, ∃(s0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ↔ ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))))))
  mpbid(hs0 = c0, ∃(s0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ↔ ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))))), ∃(s0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ↔ ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ∧ w0))))))
  syl(hs0 = c0, ∃(s0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ↔ ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ∧ w0))))), ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 → ∃(s0, ∀(s1,(w0 → s1 = s0))))))
  alrimi(s2, hs0 = c0, (s2 ∈ hs0 → ∃(s0, ∀(s1,(w0 → s1 = s0)))))
  syl6bi(hs0 = c0, s2 ∈ hs0, ∃(s0, ∀(s1,(w0 → s1 = s0))), s2 ∈ c0)
  axrep5(s2, hs0, s0, s1, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  exbidv(s0, hs0 = c0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ↔ ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ∧ w0)))), ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ↔ ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)))))
  albidv(s1, hs0 = c0, (s1 ∈ s0 ↔ ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ∧ w0))), (s1 ∈ s0 ↔ ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))))
  bibi2d(hs0 = c0, s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ hs0 ∧ w0)), ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)))
  exbid(s2, hs0 = c0, (s2 ∈ hs0 ∧ w0), (s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))
  nfeq2(s2, hs0, c0)
  anbi1d(hs0 = c0, s2 ∈ hs0, w0, s2 ∈ c0)
  eleq2(hs0, c0, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ↔ ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))))))
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: zfrep3cl
blocks.content: An inference based on the Axiom of Replacement. Typically, ` ph ` defines a function from ` x ` to ` y ` . (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm zfrep3cl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w0)))))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  zfrepclf(s0, s1, s2, c0, w0)
  nfcv(s2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm zfrep3cl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ∃(s0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 ↔ ∃(s2,(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)))))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ (s2 ∈ c0 → ∃(s0, ∀(s1,(w0 → s1 = s0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  zfrepclf(s0, s1, s2, c0, w0)
  nfcv(s2, c0)
}

blocks.name: zfrep4
blocks.content: A version of Replacement using class abstractions. (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm zfrep4(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wcel(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(w0, w1))), universe)
  -| wcel(cab(s1, w0), universe)
  -| wi(w0, wex(s2, wal(s0, wi(w1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
} = {
  eqeltrri(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(w0, w1))), universe, cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s1, w0)), w1))))
  abbii(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s1, w0)), w1)), wex(s1, wa(w0, w1)))
  exbii(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s1, w0)), w1), wa(w0, w1))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s1, w0)), w1, w0)
  issetri(s2, cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s1, w0)), w1))))
  mpbir(wex(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s1, w0)), w1))))), wex(s2, wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s1, w0)), w1))))))
  zfrepclf(s2, s0, s1, cab(s1, w0), w1)
  nfab1(s1, w0)
  sylbi(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s1, w0)), wex(s2, wal(s0, wi(w1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), w0)
  abid(s1, w0)
  exbii(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s1, w0)), w1)))), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s1, w0)), w1)))))
  abeq2(s0, cv(s2), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s1, w0)), w1)))
  diff.cab.s(s2, s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s1, w0)), w1)))
  diff.wex.s(s2, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cab(s1, w0)), w1))
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(cv(s1), cab(s1, w0)), w1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), cab(s1, w0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cab.s(s2, s1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cab.s(s0, s1, w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
}
